long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is used to avoid sending the wrong email.
After user click on the button "Send" to send an email, there is a popup displayed and ask user to confirm information.

Main functions include:
- Ask the sender to confirm the information: To, CC
- Request to fill in the email address of the superior to approve the email content
- Email will then be sent to superiors for approval
